channel.title: RuneServer & Compiler
channel.description:
Hi i've dled realistic source i set path and all those stuff i dled JSE 5 Update10 i set code:
compiler: @echo off title ZenzScape Compiler java -Xmx1024m -cp .;./jython.jar;./MySql/mysql-connector-java-3.0.17-ga-bin.jar server
server: @echo off COLOR 08 title ZenzScape server "C:Program Files\Java\jdk1.5.0_09\bin\javac.exe" -cp . *.java pause
but when i do compile or runeserver it says "cannot find path" help me?

item.title: RuneServer & Compiler
item.dc:creator: @guardian-scape_2006 guardian-scape 2006
item.description:
@guardian-scape_2006 wrote:

here u go

compile

@echo off
title yourservernamehere
“C:\Program Files\Java\jdk1.5.0_09\bin\javac.exe” -cp . *.java
“C:\Program Files\Java\jdk1.5.0_09\bin\java.exe” server
pause

runserver

@echo off
title yourservernamehere
java -Xmx1024m -cp .;./jython.jar;./MySql/mysql-connector-java-3.0.17-ga-bin.jar server

that should wrk, if it still doesnt, let me no…

Read full topic

item.title: RuneServer & Compiler
item.dc:creator: @ZenZei ZenZei
item.description:
@ZenZei wrote:

Hi i’ve dled realistic source i set path and all those stuff i dled JSE 5 Update10 i set code:

compiler: @echo off
title ZenzScape Compiler
java -Xmx1024m -cp .;./jython.jar;./MySql/mysql-connector-java-3.0.17-ga-bin.jar server

server: @echo off
COLOR 08
title ZenzScape server
“C:Program Files\Java\jdk1.5.0_09\bin\javac.exe” -cp . *.java
pause

but when i do compile or runeserver it says “cannot find path” help me?
